layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x118
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x118
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x86
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18 [color=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 220x18
          text run at (0,0) width 220: "This sentence should be in italics. "
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 208x18
          LayoutText {#text} at (219,0) size 208x18
            text run at (219,0) width 208: "This sentence should be normal."
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,34) size 784x18 [color=#000080]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 209x18
          text run at (0,0) width 209: "This sentence should be oblique."

        LayoutInline {I} at (0,0) size 207x18
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 207x18
            text run at (0,0) width 207: "This sentence should be normal."
